body:
## What happened

Android studio reports an error at startup and "Show intention actions (option + enter)" is not working in dart/flutter codes. i.e. features like 'Wrap with Column' or 'convert to expression body' is not available.

## Version information

Android Studio `3.6 Beta 1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 39.0.5` • Dart plugin `192.6603.23`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

```
com.intellij.diagnostic.PluginException: io.flutter.actions.FlutterShowStructureSettingsAction PluginClassLoader[io.flutter, 39.0.5] com.intellij.ide.plugins.cl.PluginClassLoader@5df024cb [Plugin: io.flutter]
```

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report! This issue should be addressed by upgrading to the latest version of the flutter plugin.

title: Flutter plugin throws an error
